Title: Blind Dates
Writer: Boris Frumin (screenplay), Levan Koguashvili (screenplay), Andro Sakvarelidze (collaborating writer)
Actors: Andro Sakvarelidze, Ia Sukhitashvili, Archil Kikodze, Vakho Chachanidze
Plot: Fortysomething Sandro still lives at home with his parents. He and his best friend seem to have no luck at finding true love during their misadventures of meeting and date various women.
